name: Apple Fritters/Fries
description: Delicious apple fritters (fries). Apple covered in some thick and spicy Chickpea batter and fried to a crisp golden brown. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 4 Tablespoon of chickpea flour ((garbanzo bean flour/besan))
1 Tablespoon oats ((omit this if you dont have glutenfree oats))
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes or to taste (or 1 green chili)

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender combine all ingredients except apples and oil to fry.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender combine all ingredients except apples and oil to fry.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend into a thick pasty puree/batter( adjust water and chickpea flour to get the thick consistency, water needed will depend on the flours used). For a simpler batter, just mix chickpea flour, 1/2 tsp garam masala powder, salt and pepper, or use your favorite onion fritter batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop apple slices into the batter and mix well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop apple slices into the batter and mix well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Fry in medium-high hot oil for 2-3 minutes, turning occasionally till the batter becomes darker than its color, golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with ketchup or cilantro Chutney. Top with Chaat masala or rock salt and some red chili powder for added fun. Happy Sunday!
